name: Northern Tale HD
description:
If you like the game, try other Realore's strategies -
Viking Saga: The Cursed Ring, When In Rome, Roads of Rome 3

A beautiful legend filled with magic, bravery and amazing adventures!

The story of Northern Tale begins in the lands of the mighty Viking king Ragnar. He returns home and finds his kingdom cursed and his sorceress-daughters stolen by the wicked witch. Ragnar embarks on a journey to save his family and cleanse his kingdom of evil.
In his journey Viking king is assisted by his brave companions: fearless Druid and cunning Exorcist. Together they will face countless dangers. In her rage the witch stole all the colors from the lands, inhabited forests with fierce beasts and her undead guards. Use your wisdom, magic and might to restore the balance and defeat the evil!

Check out the free trial, then unlock from within the game!

Features:

- 47 levels
- 3 season-themed episodes;
- detailed graphics and awesome visual effects;
- save the beautiful sisters;
- fight the old witch and her evil servants;
- color the black and white world!

Other popular apps from Realore:

Roads of Rome series - help Roman general Victorius get love and glory!
Island Tribe series - join brave islanders in search of new home!
Jet Trains - join cool train racing gangs to take revenge!
Farm UP - discover classic farming fun in 1930s setting!
All my Gods - become a Roman god and rule your own empire!

Available for Mac, iPhone and iPad
